1.1.name: wordpress/js-css-include-manager
1.1.description:
This plugin allows you to include extra JavaScript or CSS files in your WordPress page.

You can: * Include as many as you like. * Choose whether files are to be included on the front-end or the back-end. * Choose where to include them in the header or the footer. * Choose conditions to use for inclusion (logged-in users only, admin users only, front page only).
